post.Title: Java desktop links of the week, April 27
post.Content:
A few interesting posts this week. Enjoy! :-)

JavaFX

  • Tom Schindl has posted about his work on lightweight dialogs in e4 and JavaFX.
  • Speaking of Tom, he was interviewed on the topic of JavaFX within Eclipse.
  • Adam Bien was interviewed at jax.de on the topic of 'Java FX or HTML 5'. He makes some very interesting points.
  • Manuel Mauky has blogged that he has released mvvmFX 1.1.0, and there sound like there are a number of interesting improvements in this release.
  • Ren√© Jahn has a post about a number of custom UI controls that he has developed.

That's all folks - catch you again next week!
